channel.title: Adding skulls + lose all items on death
channel.description: In my server you can't skull :P. any one know how to fix?

How do I declare them correctly? sorry i’m new.

item.title: Adding skulls + lose all items on death
item.dc:creator: @TheEndGame TheEndGame
item.description:
@TheEndGame wrote:

I this with that:
public void checkHead(){
if(!isSkulled){
headIcon = 0;
}
if(isSkulled){
headIcon = 0;
}
}
public void getHead(){
if(ProtMage && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 4;
if(ProtRange && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 2;
if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 1;
if(Retribution && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 8;
if(Redemption && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 32;
if(Smite && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 16;
if(ProtMage && isSkulled)
headIcon = 4;
if(ProtRange && isSkulled)
headIcon = 2;
if(ProtMelee && isSkulled)
headIcon = 1;
if(Retribution && isSkulled)
headIcon = 8;
if(Redemption && isSkulled)
headIcon = 32;
if(Smite && isSkulled)
headIcon = 16;
}
public void turnOffHead(){
if(ProtMage)
headIcon = 4;
if(ProtRange)
headIcon = 2;
if(ProtMelee)
headIcon = 1;
if(Retribution)
headIcon = 8;
if(Redemption)
headIcon = 32;
if(Smite)
headIcon = 16;
else
if(!isSkulled && !ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite)
headIcon = 0;
}

I got 14 errors saying couldnt find symbol. If I just add it and dont replace it says checkhead is allready defined in client. Do you know whats up?

Read full topic
